name: axios
text:
Coca-Cola is pulling all paid social media advertisements for 30 days, saying "there is no place for racism on social media," CEO James Quincey said in a statement on Friday.

https://t.co/lhsInbNgcO

name: axios
text:
A federal appeals court has ruled that the Trump administration's transfer of $2.5 billion from the Pentagon for southern border wall construction was an illegal breach of its executive authority.
https://t.co/GlDIJrASvc
